sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import {Button} from '../ButtonElement'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, primary, dark, dark2 } from './InfoElements'; const Info = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headLine, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt }) =>{ return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default Info;
